Playlist T-Dose 2007
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEieGLtIxfaL1y1QPBLTUSegB

T-DOSE 2007, Lodel publishing tool, by Odile Benassy.

A Content Management System for Academic Social Science [PDF]
How to set up and use web sites for academic research centers. Lodel is a Content Management System with advanced features like

    * template scripting language
    * configurable publishing objects
    * import from styled Word documents
    * indexes


More at
http://www.t-dose.org/2007/speakers:

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
October 13, 2007
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2007, Lodel publishing tool, Odile Benassy
